faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Our catalogue boasts a diverse list of world-class physical offices ideal for businesses of all sizes, ranging from 1 to 50 persons.
items.answer: Yes, most Free Zones and Mainland authorities allow business owners to lease a virtual office to issue a business license.

items.question: What are the best places to lease or rent a physical office in the UAE?
items.answer: The ideal place depends on the nature of your business and your target audience. For instance, industrial companies are best-suited for strategic locations like Jebel Ali & Ras Al Khor, whereas service-based companies will thrive in Downtown Dubai or Business Bay.

items.question: Can Free Zone companies lease physical spaces in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, you can lease or rent physical commercial spaces in Dubai by obtaining a No Objection Certificate.

items.question: How many visas can you apply for with a physical office?
items.answer: You can apply for multiple visas and sponsorships, depending on your jurisdiction, license, and size of the office.

items.question: How can I lease a commercial office in the UAE?
items.answer: You can easily lease a physical commercial space by booking a free consultation with our experts.
